data.content:
Maokai: The Twisted Treant

Release Date: February 16, 2011

Maokai, also known as the Twisted Treant, is a powerful tank and crowd control specialist in the popular online game League of Legends. With his unique abilities and intriguing backstory, Maokai has become a beloved champion among players. In this article, we will delve into the depths of Maokai's story, explore his strengths and weaknesses, and discuss his significant role in the game.

The Story of Maokai

Maokai's tale begins in the Shadow Isles, a haunting and cursed land filled with malevolent spirits. Once a mighty treant who protected the natural world, Maokai was corrupted by the dark magic that permeated the Shadow Isles. Now, he seeks to restore balance and cleanse the land from the clutches of evil.

Driven by his desire to restore the natural order, Maokai fights against the forces of darkness, using his immense power to protect the innocent and punish those who would harm the land. With his roots firmly planted in the earth, he unleashes devastating abilities to control his enemies and disrupt their plans.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Maokai possesses a unique set of strengths and weaknesses that make him a formidable force on the battlefield. His primary strength lies in his ability to soak up damage and protect his allies. With his passive ability, Sap Magic, Maokai gains health whenever he casts a spell or is struck by an enemy ability. This allows him to sustain in fights and remain a constant threat.

Furthermore, Maokai's abilities are centered around crowd control, making him an excellent initiator and disruptor. His Q ability, Bramble Smash, sends out a shockwave that damages and slows enemies, while his W ability, Twisted Advance, allows him to root himself to a target, immobilizing them and dealing damage. These abilities, combined with his ultimate, Nature's Grasp, which sends out a massive wave of roots, make Maokai a nightmare for enemies trying to engage or escape.

However, Maokai does have weaknesses that players must be mindful of. His early game can be challenging, as he relies heavily on mana and cooldown management. Additionally, his damage output is not as high as some other champions, making him more reliant on his team to secure kills. Proper positioning and timing are crucial for Maokai players to maximize their impact in team fights.

Maokai in the Game

Maokai's unique playstyle and versatile kit have made him a popular pick in both professional and casual play. In competitive matches, Maokai is often chosen for his ability to engage fights and protect his carries. His crowd control abilities can turn the tide of team fights, allowing his team to secure objectives and gain an advantage.

Furthermore, Maokai's presence in the game extends beyond his abilities. His lore and character design have captivated players, making him a fan-favorite champion. His twisted appearance, with branches and roots protruding from his body, perfectly reflects his corrupted nature and his determination to restore balance.

On the League of Legends website, players can access detailed information and videos showcasing all of Maokai's skins. From the classic Twisted Treant to the hauntingly beautiful Victorious Maokai, each skin offers a unique visual experience that allows players to further immerse themselves in the world of Maokai.

Maokai's journey from a noble protector to a twisted force of nature is a captivating story that resonates with players. His strengths as a tank and crowd control specialist, combined with his intriguing lore, make him a significant presence in the League of Legends universe. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the game, Maokai is a champion worth exploring and mastering.

Maokai (Meowkai)

RP Cost: 1350 | Release Date: October 29, 2015

Maokai, the twisted treant, has always been a formidable force on the Rift. With his roots firmly planted in the ground, he has protected the natural balance of the world for centuries. But what if this ancient guardian of nature took on a more playful and adorable form? Enter Meowkai, the feline-inspired skin that brings a whole new level of cuteness to Maokai's arsenal.

Released on October 29, 2015, Meowkai quickly became a fan favorite among League of Legends players. This skin transforms Maokai into an adorable cat-like creature, complete with fluffy fur, twitching whiskers, and a mischievous grin. Meowkai's abilities also receive a feline makeover, making it a must-have skin for any Maokai enthusiast.

Let's dive into the details of this charming skin. Meowkai's model is a complete departure from Maokai's usual treant appearance. Instead of bark and branches, Meowkai is covered in soft, orange fur with white patches. His eyes glow with a playful mischief, and his mouth is filled with sharp, cat-like teeth. The skin also features a set of twitching whiskers and pointy ears, adding to the overall feline aesthetic.

Meowkai's abilities receive delightful visual updates as well. His Q ability, Bramble Smash, transforms into a playful swipe of his paw, leaving behind a trail of colorful yarn. Saplings, his E ability, become adorable little kittens that scamper towards enemies, exploding upon impact. His ultimate ability, Nature's Grasp, summons a line of cat-shaped roots that stretch across the battlefield, ensnaring anyone unfortunate enough to be caught in their path.

Now that we've covered the details of Meowkai, let's take a moment to explore Maokai's story and his place in the League of Legends universe.

Maokai, the Twisted Treant, is a champion deeply rooted in the lore of League of Legends. He is an ancient being, born from the spirit of a sacred oak tree that once stood in the heart of a magical forest. When the forest was corrupted by dark magic, Maokai emerged as a guardian, seeking to restore balance and protect the natural world.

In the game, Maokai is a tanky champion with a focus on crowd control and disruption. His abilities allow him to engage enemies, soak up damage, and provide utility to his team. His passive ability, Sap Magic, allows him to heal himself when he takes damage, making him a resilient frontline champion. His Q ability, Bramble Smash, damages and slows enemies in an area, while his W ability, Twisted Advance, allows him to root himself to a target, immobilizing them and dealing damage. Maokai's E ability, Saplings, lets him throw explosive saplings that chase down enemies and explode on contact. Finally, his ultimate ability, Nature's Grasp, sends out a wave of roots that knock up enemies and create impassable terrain.

Maokai's strengths lie in his ability to initiate team fights and disrupt the enemy team. His crowd control abilities make him a valuable asset in both offensive and defensive situations. He can lock down priority targets with his Twisted Advance, allowing his team to follow up with damage. His ultimate ability, Nature's Grasp, can turn the tide of a team fight by creating chaos and separating the enemy team.

However, Maokai also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He lacks sustained damage and relies heavily on his team to follow up on his crowd control. His abilities have relatively high cooldowns, making him vulnerable during the downtime. Additionally, Maokai's tankiness comes at the cost of damage output, so he may struggle to secure kills on his own.

Overall, Maokai is a versatile champion who excels in team fights and provides valuable utility to his team. His unique playstyle and engaging abilities make him a popular pick among players of all skill levels.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Maokai's appearances, including the adorable Meowkai skin. Whether you're a fan of his treant form or prefer the playful charm of Meowkai, there's something for everyone to enjoy.

Maokai (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Maokai, the Twisted Treant, is a formidable champion in the popular online game League of Legends. As one of the oldest champions in the game, Maokai has become a staple pick for players who enjoy tanky and disruptive playstyles. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Maokai's default skin and explore the intricate details of his appearance. Additionally, we will provide a brief overview of Maokai's lore, strengths, weaknesses, and his significance within the game.

The Story of Maokai's Default Skin

Maokai's default skin represents his original appearance when he was first introduced to the League of Legends universe. As a treant, Maokai embodies the essence of nature and the balance between life and death. His default skin showcases his connection to the forest, with bark-like skin, gnarled branches, and glowing green eyes. Maokai's design is both intimidating and captivating, capturing the essence of his role as a tank and disruptor on the battlefield.

The default skin features Maokai in his full treant form, towering over his enemies with his massive size. His body is covered in thick, rough bark, providing natural armor and protection. His limbs are composed of twisted branches, each ending in sharp, thorny protrusions. Maokai's face is adorned with a menacing expression, reflecting his determination to protect the natural world from those who seek to harm it.

The color palette of Maokai's default skin is predominantly earthy tones, with various shades of brown and green. This color scheme further emphasizes his connection to nature and the forest. The attention to detail in his design is remarkable, with intricate textures and patterns on his bark-like skin. The glowing green eyes add an eerie touch, hinting at the magical power that flows through his veins.

Overall, Maokai's default skin is a testament to his role as the guardian of the forest. It perfectly captures his intimidating presence and his commitment to preserving the natural world. Whether you're playing as Maokai or facing him on the battlefield, his default skin is a visual representation of his strength and resilience.

The Story of Maokai

Maokai's lore is deeply rooted in the forests of Runeterra. Once a peaceful nature spirit, Maokai's existence was forever changed when the Shadow Isles were consumed by the Black Mist. As the corruption spread, it twisted the once vibrant and lush forests into a dark and haunting place. Maokai, driven by his duty to protect the natural world, fought against the encroaching darkness but was ultimately consumed by it.

Emerging from the depths of the Shadow Isles, Maokai returned as a vengeful and tormented treant. He seeks to reclaim the land that was stolen from him and restore balance to the world. With his newfound powers, Maokai wields the forces of nature as weapons, using his roots to ensnare enemies and his branches to crush them. He is a relentless force, unyielding in his mission to eradicate the corruption that plagues the land.

In the game, Maokai is classified as a tank and a disruptor. His abilities allow him to soak up damage and disrupt the enemy team, making him an excellent choice for engaging in team fights and protecting his allies. His passive ability, Sap Magic, allows him to heal himself over time, making him incredibly durable in prolonged engagements. Maokai's abilities, such as Twisted Advance and Nature's Grasp, provide him with crowd control and area-of-effect damage, further solidifying his role as a disruptor.

However, Maokai does have weaknesses. His early game can be challenging, as he relies on levels and items to become a formidable tank. Additionally, his abilities have relatively high cooldowns, making proper ability management crucial for success. Maokai's reliance on crowd control and disruption means that he may struggle against champions with high mobility or those who can burst him down quickly.

Maokai in the League of Legends

Maokai holds a significant place in the League of Legends universe. As one of the original champions, he has been a part of the game since its early days. His unique design and gameplay mechanics have made him a fan-favorite among players who enjoy tanky and disruptive playstyles. Maokai's lore and appearance also contribute to the rich tapestry of the game's world, adding depth and intrigue to the overall narrative.

If you're interested in exploring Maokai's various appearances and skins, you can find more information and videos on our dedicated page. From his default skin to his numerous alternate appearances, each skin offers a unique visual experience that enhances the gameplay and immersion. Whether you prefer the classic look of the default skin or want to explore the creative possibilities of his alternate appearances, Maokai's visual design is sure to impress.

In conclusion, Maokai's default skin is a testament to his role as the guardian of the forest. With its intricate details, earthy color palette, and imposing presence, the default skin perfectly captures Maokai's essence. Whether you're a fan of his lore, gameplay, or visual design, Maokai is a champion that continues to captivate players and leave a lasting impression on the League of Legends community.

Maokai (Charred Maokai)

RP: 975 | Release Date: November 29, 2011

Maokai, the Twisted Treant, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his powerful control over nature, Maokai has become a fan-favorite due to his unique abilities and engaging gameplay. One of the many skins available for Maokai is the

skin, which offers players a visually stunning and thematically fitting alternative appearance for the champion.

The

skin transforms Maokai into a fiery and menacing version of himself. With charred bark and glowing embers, this skin truly embodies the destructive power of fire. The flames that engulf Maokai's body give him an intimidating presence on the battlefield, striking fear into the hearts of his enemies.

Every aspect of Maokai's appearance is altered in the

skin. His tree-like body is charred and blackened, with glowing red cracks running through his bark. His branches are engulfed in flames, and his eyes burn with an intense fiery glow. The attention to detail in this skin is truly remarkable, making it a must-have for any Maokai enthusiast.

Not only does the

skin offer a visually stunning transformation, but it also comes with unique particle effects and sound effects. Abilities such as Maokai's Q - Bramble Smash and W - Twisted Advance are enhanced with fiery effects, leaving a trail of flames in their wake. The sound effects are also modified to match the theme, with crackling fire and burning embers accompanying Maokai's every move.

Now that we've explored the details of the

skin, let's delve into the story of Maokai himself. Maokai is a powerful nature spirit who was once a peaceful treant, protecting the forests and maintaining the balance of nature. However, when the Rune Wars ravaged the land, Maokai's home was destroyed, and he was consumed by the dark magic unleashed during the conflict.

Twisted and corrupted by the destructive forces, Maokai emerged as a vengeful being, seeking to restore the balance and punish those responsible for the devastation. He now roams the land, using his powers over nature to bring justice to those who would harm the natural world.

In the game, Maokai is primarily played as a tank and a crowd control specialist. His abilities allow him to disrupt enemy formations, soak up damage, and protect his allies. His passive ability, Sap Magic, allows him to heal himself when he takes damage, making him a resilient frontline champion.

Maokai's Q - Bramble Smash sends out a shockwave that damages and slows enemies, while his W - Twisted Advance allows him to dash towards a target, rooting them in place. His E - Sapling Toss throws explosive saplings that deal damage and provide vision, making them useful for scouting and zoning enemies. Finally, his ultimate ability, R - Nature's Grasp, summons a massive wall of thorns that damages and immobilizes enemies caught in its path.

While Maokai excels at initiating team fights and disrupting enemy formations, he does have some weaknesses. His early game can be challenging, as he relies on levels and items to become tanky and impactful. Additionally, Maokai's abilities have relatively high cooldowns, so timing and resource management are crucial when playing him.

Despite these weaknesses, Maokai remains a popular pick in both casual and competitive play. His ability to control team fights and protect his allies makes him a valuable asset to any team composition. With the

skin, players can now showcase their love for this powerful champion in a visually stunning and thematically fitting way.

For more information about Maokai and his various appearances, including the
skin, be sure to visit our page dedicated to this beloved champion. Watch videos, explore different skins, and discover the full potential of Maokai in the world of League of Legends.

Maokai (Festive Maokai)

RP Cost: 1350 | Release Date: December 2011

Maokai, the Twisted Treant, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his powerful crowd control abilities and tanky nature, Maokai has become a favorite pick for players who enjoy playing as a supportive tank in the top lane or jungle role. With his unique appearance and captivating lore, Maokai has become an iconic character in the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Festive Maokai

Festive Maokai is a skin that was released in December 2011, just in time for the holiday season. This skin transforms Maokai into a jolly, festive tree, complete with colorful lights, ornaments, and a star on top. The skin perfectly captures the spirit of the holiday season and adds a touch of cheer to Maokai's otherwise dark and mysterious persona.

With Festive Maokai, players can experience the joy of the holiday season while wreaking havoc on the battlefield. The skin features unique visual effects, such as snowflakes falling around Maokai and presents appearing when he uses his abilities. The sound effects are also modified to match the festive theme, with jingle bells ringing and cheerful music playing in the background.

One of the standout features of Festive Maokai is his ultimate ability, Nature's Grasp. Instead of summoning a wall of thorny vines, Festive Maokai summons a wall of presents, complete with a bow on top. This ability not only deals damage to enemies but also adds a touch of whimsy to the game.

Overall, Festive Maokai is a delightful skin that brings holiday cheer to the League of Legends universe. Whether you're a fan of Maokai or simply enjoy spreading holiday joy, this skin is a must-have for any player.

The Story of Maokai

Maokai's story begins in the Shadow Isles, a cursed land filled with darkness and despair. Once a mighty treant, Maokai was transformed into a twisted abomination by the Black Mist that plagues the Shadow Isles. Bound by his own roots and tormented by his past, Maokai seeks to rid the world of the evil that has consumed him.

In the game, Maokai is a tanky champion with a focus on crowd control and disruption. His abilities allow him to root enemies in place, knock them back, and absorb damage for his team. With his passive ability, Sap Magic, Maokai can heal himself by absorbing damage, making him a formidable force in team fights.

Maokai's strengths lie in his ability to initiate fights and peel for his team. His Twisted Advance ability allows him to dash to an enemy champion, rooting them in place and making them vulnerable to his team's attacks. His ultimate ability, Nature's Grasp, creates a massive wall of thorny vines that damages and slows enemies, making it an excellent tool for engaging or disengaging from fights.

However, Maokai also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He lacks strong damage output, relying on his team to follow up on his crowd control abilities. Additionally, his abilities have relatively high cooldowns, making him vulnerable during the downtime between his spells. Maokai's ultimate ability, while powerful, can be easily dodged or mitigated by mobile champions or those with crowd control removal abilities.

In the lore of League of Legends, Maokai is a guardian of the natural world, seeking to restore balance and protect the innocent. He is a tragic figure, forever bound to the Shadow Isles, but driven by a sense of duty and justice. Maokai's story is one of redemption and sacrifice, as he battles against the darkness within himself and fights to save others from a similar fate.

Explore Maokai's Appearances

If you're interested in learning more about Maokai and his various appearances in League of Legends, you can find detailed information and videos on our dedicated page. From his classic appearance to his festive skin and everything in between, you'll discover the full range of Maokai's visual transformations and the stories behind them.

Whether you're a fan of Maokai's lore, a dedicated player looking to master his gameplay, or simply curious about the world of League of Legends, our page is the perfect resource for all things Maokai. Dive into the twisted world of the Twisted Treant and uncover the secrets that lie within.

Maokai (Goalkeeper Maokai)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: June 1, 2012

Goalkeeper Maokai is a skin for the champion Maokai in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on June 1, 2012, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. With its unique theme and visual effects, Goalkeeper Maokai offers players a fresh and exciting way to experience the game.

The Goalkeeper Maokai skin transforms the treant-like champion into a soccer goalkeeper, complete with a soccer ball as his sapling and a goal net as his ultimate ability. The skin features a vibrant green and yellow color scheme, reminiscent of a soccer field, and Maokai's abilities are visually modified to match the theme.

When using his Q ability, Bramble Smash, Maokai swings his soccer ball, leaving a trail of grass behind. His W ability, Twisted Advance, allows him to dash towards enemies, leaving a trail of soccer field markings in his wake. Saplings thrown with his E ability, Sapling Toss, take the form of soccer balls, bouncing towards enemies with a satisfying kick sound effect. Finally, his ultimate ability, Nature's Grasp, summons a giant goal net that roots enemies caught within its range.

Maokai, the Twisted Treant, is a tanky support champion in League of Legends. He is known for his ability to disrupt team fights and protect his allies with his crowd control and damage mitigation abilities. Maokai's passive ability, Sap Magic, allows him to heal himself by absorbing damage, making him a durable frontline champion.

Maokai's Q ability, Bramble Smash, damages and slows enemies in a small area, making it a great tool for initiating fights or peeling for his carries. His W ability, Twisted Advance, allows him to dash towards an enemy, rooting them in place and preventing them from escaping or engaging. This ability can be used to catch out priority targets or to protect his team's carries from assassins.

His E ability, Sapling Toss, allows Maokai to throw saplings that explode upon contact with enemies, dealing damage and slowing them. These saplings can be strategically placed in bushes or chokepoints to provide vision and zone control. Finally, his ultimate ability, Nature's Grasp, sends out a line of roots that damages and roots enemies caught in its path. This ability can be used to initiate team fights or to disengage from unfavorable engagements.

In the lore of League of Legends, Maokai was once a peaceful nature spirit who protected the forests of Runeterra. However, he was corrupted by the dark magic of the Shadow Isles and transformed into a vengeful treant. Now, he seeks to restore balance and protect the natural world from further destruction.

Maokai's unique appearance and abilities make him a versatile champion in the game. He can be played as a support in the bottom lane, providing crowd control and protection for his ADC. Alternatively, he can be played as a top laner, using his tankiness and crowd control to disrupt the enemy team and protect his own carries.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Maokai, including the Goalkeeper Maokai skin. Whether you're a fan of Maokai or simply interested in exploring the different skins available in League of Legends, this page is a valuable resource for all your Maokai needs.

Maokai (Totemic Maokai)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: November 29, 2012

Maokai, the Twisted Treant, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his powerful crowd control abilities and tanky nature, Maokai is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. One of his most iconic skins is the Totemic Maokai skin, which transforms him into a mystical guardian of the forest.

The Totemic Maokai skin was released on November 29, 2012, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. This skin gives Maokai a complete visual overhaul, turning him into a towering totem pole-like figure. His bark-like skin is adorned with intricate carvings and glowing runes, giving him an otherworldly appearance.

Not only does Totemic Maokai change Maokai's appearance, but it also brings new animations and effects to the champion. His abilities are transformed to match his new theme, with roots and vines sprouting from the ground as he casts his spells. The sound effects are also modified, adding an ethereal and ancient feel to his abilities.

Now, let's delve into the lore behind Maokai and how he fits into the world of League of Legends. Maokai was once a peaceful nature spirit, residing in the forests of Kumungu. However, when the Rune Wars ravaged the land, Maokai's home was destroyed, and he was transformed into a vengeful treant. Seeking to restore balance and protect the natural world, Maokai joined the League of Legends.

In the game, Maokai is primarily played as a tanky support or top laner. His abilities revolve around crowd control and disruption, making him a valuable asset in team fights. His passive ability, Sap Magic, allows him to heal himself when he takes damage, making him incredibly durable. His Q ability, Bramble Smash, damages and slows enemies in an area, while his W ability, Twisted Advance, allows him to root himself to an enemy champion, immobilizing them and dealing damage. Maokai's E ability, Sapling Toss, lets him throw explosive saplings that deal damage and provide vision. Finally, his ultimate ability, Nature's Grasp, sends out a wave of roots that damages and immobilizes enemies in its path.

Maokai's strengths lie in his ability to initiate team fights and lock down priority targets. His crowd control abilities make it difficult for enemies to escape or engage, allowing his team to follow up with their own damage. Additionally, his passive healing and tankiness make him a formidable frontliner, capable of soaking up damage and protecting his allies.

However, Maokai does have weaknesses that can be exploited by skilled opponents. His early game can be challenging, as he relies on levels and items to become truly impactful. Additionally, his abilities have relatively high mana costs, making resource management crucial. Maokai is also susceptible to champions with high burst damage or true damage, as his healing may not be enough to sustain him in intense fights.

Overall, Maokai is a versatile champion with a unique playstyle. Whether you prefer to protect your team as a support or dominate the top lane as a tank, Maokai offers a rewarding and strategic experience. If you're interested in learning more about Maokai and his various appearances, you can find information and videos on the official League of Legends website.

So, embrace the power of nature and unleash the fury of the forest with Totemic Maokai!

Maokai (Worldbreaker Maokai)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: March 2, 2017

Worldbreaker Maokai is a skin for the champion Maokai in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on March 2, 2017, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. With its unique design and thematic elements, Worldbreaker Maokai offers players a fresh and exciting visual experience.

The Worldbreaker Maokai skin transforms the treant-like champion into a towering, ancient being of destruction. Maokai's appearance is altered to reflect the destructive power of the Worldbreakers, a group of elemental beings who seek to bring chaos and devastation to the world. In this skin, Maokai is covered in rocky armor, with glowing cracks and molten lava flowing through his body. His branches and roots are transformed into jagged, obsidian-like spikes, giving him a menacing and formidable presence on the battlefield.

One of the standout features of the Worldbreaker Maokai skin is the visual effects it brings to Maokai's abilities. Each of his abilities is enhanced with fiery and explosive effects, emphasizing the destructive nature of the Worldbreakers. For example, his Q ability, Bramble Smash, sends out a wave of molten rocks that explode upon impact. His W ability, Twisted Advance, causes Maokai to burst into flames as he roots and damages his target. These visual enhancements not only make the skin visually appealing but also add an extra layer of immersion and excitement to gameplay.

In addition to the visual effects, Worldbreaker Maokai also features unique sound effects and voice lines. The sound effects for his abilities are deep and rumbling, further emphasizing the power behind each ability. Maokai's voice lines are altered to reflect his new role as a Worldbreaker, with lines such as
and

These additions help to fully immerse players in the fantasy of playing as a destructive force of nature.

Now, let's delve into the lore and story of Maokai, the champion behind the Worldbreaker Maokai skin. Maokai is a sentient tree who was once a peaceful nature spirit. However, when the Shadow Isles were consumed by the Black Mist, Maokai's peaceful existence was shattered. The Black Mist corrupted the land, turning it into a twisted and haunted place. Seeking to restore balance and protect the natural world, Maokai bound himself to a magical artifact known as the Blessed Isles, which would later become the Shadow Isles.

Maokai's abilities in the game reflect his connection to nature and his desire to restore balance. His passive ability, Sap Magic, allows him to heal himself by absorbing the energy of nearby enemies. His Q ability, Bramble Smash, damages and slows enemies in an area, while his W ability, Twisted Advance, allows him to root himself to a target, damaging and immobilizing them. His E ability, Sapling Toss, allows him to throw explosive saplings that chase and explode on enemies. Finally, his ultimate ability, Nature's Grasp, sends out a massive wave of roots that damages and immobilizes enemies in its path.

Maokai's strengths lie in his ability to initiate team fights and disrupt the enemy team. With his Twisted Advance ability, he can lock down priority targets and prevent them from escaping. His Nature's Grasp ultimate can turn the tide of a team fight by immobilizing multiple enemies, allowing his team to follow up with their own abilities. Additionally, Maokai's passive ability, Sap Magic, provides him with sustain in the laning phase, making him a durable and difficult champion to take down.

However, Maokai also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. His early game can be challenging, as he relies on scaling and items to become a true threat. Maokai's damage output is not as high as some other champions, so he relies on his crowd control and tankiness to be effective. Additionally, Maokai's abilities have relatively high cooldowns, so timing and resource management are crucial when playing him.

In the world of League of Legends, Maokai is often seen as a reliable and versatile tank champion. His ability to engage and disrupt team fights makes him a valuable asset to any team composition. Whether it's protecting his carries, initiating fights, or peeling for his team, Maokai's utility and durability make him a force to be reckoned with.

If you want to learn more about Maokai and his various appearances in the game, you can visit the official League of Legends website or check out gameplay videos on platforms like YouTube and Twitch. Maokai has a rich lore and a variety of skins, each offering a unique visual and thematic experience. So, dive into the world of Maokai and discover the power of the Worldbreakers!

Maokai (DRX Maokai)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: October 1, 2020

Maokai, the ancient and vengeful tree spirit, has received a new skin in the League of Legends universe. The DRX Maokai skin, released on October 1, 2020, is a visually stunning and thematically fitting addition to Maokai's wardrobe. This skin is a collaboration between Riot Games and the professional League of Legends team, DRX, and pays homage to their partnership.

The DRX Maokai skin is priced at 1350 RP, making it a mid-tier skin in terms of cost. With its unique visual effects, animations, and sound effects, this skin offers players a fresh and exciting way to experience Maokai's gameplay.

Details of the Costume

DRX Maokai transforms the ancient tree spirit into a fearsome and imposing figure. The skin features Maokai adorned in DRX team colors, with a vibrant blue and white color scheme. His bark is now covered in intricate patterns, resembling the team's logo, and his branches and roots have a glowing blue aura.

One of the standout features of the DRX Maokai skin is the new animations and visual effects. Maokai's abilities have been reimagined to match the DRX theme. For example, his Q ability, Bramble Smash, now unleashes a flurry of DRX logos instead of the usual thorny vines. His W ability, Twisted Advance, has a new animation where he charges forward with a burst of energy, leaving behind a trail of DRX symbols.

Furthermore, the skin also includes unique recall animation, where Maokai summons a holographic representation of the DRX team logo, showcasing his allegiance to the team. The attention to detail in this skin is truly remarkable, and it is a must-have for both Maokai enthusiasts and fans of the DRX team.

The Story of Maokai

Maokai, known as the Twisted Treant, is a champion in the popular online game, League of Legends. He is a vengeful spirit who seeks to protect the natural world from those who would harm it. Once a peaceful nature spirit, Maokai was transformed into a twisted and tormented being after the Shadow Isles were consumed by the Black Mist.

Maokai's past is shrouded in mystery, but it is believed that he was once a guardian of the Blessed Isles, a land of beauty and tranquility. However, when the Shadow Isles were corrupted by the Black Mist, Maokai's essence was tainted, and he became a vengeful force of nature.

In the game, Maokai is primarily played as a tanky support or top laner. His abilities revolve around crowd control and disruption, making him a valuable asset in team fights. His passive ability, Sap Magic, allows him to heal himself by absorbing damage, while his Q ability, Bramble Smash, damages and slows enemies in an area. His W ability, Twisted Advance, allows him to root himself to a target, immobilizing them and dealing damage. Maokai's E ability, Sapling Toss, allows him to throw explosive saplings that deal damage and provide vision. Finally, his ultimate ability, Nature's Grasp, sends out a wave of roots that damages and immobilizes enemies in its path.

Maokai's strengths lie in his ability to initiate team fights and soak up damage for his team. With his crowd control abilities, he can disrupt the enemy team's positioning and protect his allies. His tankiness and sustain make him a formidable opponent in the top lane, and his utility as a support can turn the tide of team fights.

However, Maokai also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He lacks strong burst damage and relies on sustained damage over time. Additionally, his abilities have relatively long cooldowns, making him vulnerable during the downtime. Maokai's effectiveness also diminishes in the late game when enemy champions have built up significant damage and can easily shred through his defenses.

Despite his weaknesses, Maokai has remained a popular pick in both casual and professional play. His unique theme and gameplay make him a favorite among players who enjoy tanky and disruptive champions.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Maokai's appearances in the League of Legends universe. Whether you're interested in his base skin or his various alternate skins, this page serves as a comprehensive resource for all things Maokai.

Maokai (Victorious Maokai)

RP Cost: Unknown | Release Date: Unknown

Victorious Maokai is a highly sought-after skin in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin is part of the prestigious Victorious line, which is awarded to players who achieve a certain rank in the game's ranked mode during a specific season. The Victorious Maokai skin is a symbol of skill, dedication, and accomplishment, making it a prized possession for many players.

As the name suggests, Victorious Maokai transforms the treant-like champion into a majestic and regal figure. The skin features Maokai adorned in golden armor, with intricate details and glowing green accents. His wooden body is covered in vibrant foliage, showcasing his connection to nature and his role as the guardian of the Twisted Treeline. The skin also includes unique visual effects, such as golden particles and a majestic recall animation.

Obtaining the Victorious Maokai skin is no easy feat. Players must climb the ranked ladder and reach a specific rank during the season in which the skin is available. The exact requirements vary from season to season, but it typically requires reaching at least Gold or higher rank. This means that only a select few players who have demonstrated exceptional skill and dedication can unlock this prestigious skin.

Maokai, the champion behind the Victorious Maokai skin, is a powerful tank and crowd control specialist in League of Legends. He is known for his ability to disrupt team fights and protect his allies with his crowd control abilities and tankiness. Maokai's kit revolves around his ability to control the battlefield, using his roots and saplings to immobilize enemies and provide vision in key areas.

Maokai's story within the League of Legends universe is deeply rooted in nature and the balance between life and death. Once a peaceful nature spirit, Maokai was corrupted by the dark magic of the Shadow Isles. He now seeks to restore the balance and protect the natural world from the encroaching darkness. With his powerful abilities and unwavering determination, Maokai fights alongside his allies to bring harmony back to the land.

In the game, Maokai is primarily played in the top lane or as a support. His tankiness and crowd control make him a valuable asset in team fights, where he can disrupt the enemy team and protect his carries. Maokai's ultimate ability, Nature's Grasp, is particularly impactful, as it sends out a wave of roots that damages and immobilizes enemies in its path.

With the Victorious Maokai skin, players can not only harness the power of this formidable champion but also showcase their skill and dedication to the game. The skin serves as a visual representation of a player's accomplishments and is a testament to their success in the ranked ladder. It is a highly coveted skin that stands out among the vast array of cosmetic options available in League of Legends.

Maokai (Astronaut Maokai)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: July 22, 2021

Maokai, the ancient and wise tree spirit, has embarked on an interstellar journey with his latest skin, Astronaut Maokai. This cosmic-themed skin takes Maokai to new heights as he explores the vastness of space, bringing a unique and otherworldly experience to the League of Legends universe.

Astronaut Maokai is a visually stunning skin that transforms Maokai into a space-faring entity. Clad in a futuristic astronaut suit, Maokai's appearance is completely revamped to reflect his new intergalactic persona. His wooden body is now encased in a high-tech spacesuit, complete with a helmet that protects his face and glowing blue visor that adds an air of mystery to his character.

The attention to detail in Astronaut Maokai is truly remarkable. From the intricate design of his spacesuit to the glowing energy emanating from his body, every aspect of this skin has been carefully crafted to create a visually stunning and immersive experience. The skin also features unique visual effects, such as cosmic particles and glowing stars, that add a touch of celestial beauty to Maokai's abilities.

One of the standout features of Astronaut Maokai is his recall animation. When Maokai recalls, he transforms into a rocket and blasts off into space, leaving a trail of stardust in his wake. This recall animation perfectly captures the essence of the skin and adds an extra layer of excitement and immersion for players.

Now, let's delve into the story of Maokai and how he came to don the Astronaut Maokai skin. Maokai is a champion deeply rooted in the lore of League of Legends. He is a sentient tree, born from the magic of the Shadow Isles, a cursed land filled with darkness and despair. Once a peaceful nature spirit, Maokai was corrupted by the malevolent influence of the Black Mist that shrouds the Shadow Isles.

In his quest to rid the world of the Black Mist and restore balance to the land, Maokai has ventured into uncharted territories, including the vastness of space. The Astronaut Maokai skin represents one of his many adventures beyond the confines of Runeterra. Equipped with advanced technology and a determination to protect all life, Maokai explores the cosmos, fighting against cosmic threats and spreading the message of harmony and balance.

Maokai's strengths lie in his ability to control the battlefield and disrupt enemy movements. With his powerful crowd control abilities, such as his Twisted Advance and Nature's Grasp, Maokai can lock down key targets and initiate team fights with ease. His passive ability, Sap Magic, also allows him to sustain himself in prolonged engagements, making him a formidable tank and front-line champion.

However, Maokai does have weaknesses that players must be mindful of. His early game can be challenging, as he relies on levels and items to reach his full potential. Additionally, Maokai's abilities have relatively high cooldowns, so timing and resource management are crucial for maximizing his effectiveness in team fights. Proper positioning and coordination with teammates are also essential, as Maokai's ultimate ability, Nature's Grasp, requires precise timing and communication to unleash its full power.

In the world of League of Legends, Maokai holds a special place as a unique and iconic champion. His lore and character design have captivated players since his release, and his gameplay offers a refreshing and strategic experience. Whether you're a fan of his cosmic adventures as Astronaut Maokai or prefer his classic appearance, Maokai is a champion that embodies the spirit of nature and the eternal struggle between light and darkness.

Maokai, the Twisted Treant, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his haunting appearance and powerful abilities, Maokai has become a favorite among players. One of his most iconic skins is the

skin, which adds an eerie twist to his already spooky character.

The skin also includes unique visual effects and sound effects, further enhancing the haunting atmosphere.

As a champion, Maokai is known for his tankiness and crowd control abilities. He excels at initiating team fights and disrupting the enemy team with his powerful abilities. His passive ability, Sap Magic, allows him to heal himself when he takes damage, making him a durable frontline champion.

Maokai's Q ability, Bramble Smash, sends out a shockwave that damages and slows enemies in its path. His E ability, Sapling Toss, throws explosive saplings that explode on contact, damaging and slowing enemies. Finally, his ultimate ability, Nature's Grasp, sends out a massive wave of roots that damages and immobilizes enemies caught in its path.

Maokai's Haunted Maokai skin truly captures the essence of his character, emphasizing his connection to the haunting and mysterious forces of nature. The skin adds an extra layer of depth to his gameplay experience, immersing players in the eerie world of the Twisted Treant.
